page.title: 07RESWALLIE ESTATE
page.content: Reswallie House is now owned by Colonel (retd.) J.D. Lloyd-Jones O.B.E (the administrator of Glamis Castle). His land covers roughly seventy acres. The Colonel is very conscious of the{ {ECOLOGY}of his land. Much of his land is covered by bogs and marshes and is therefore useless, but he has about twenty acres of usable{FARMLAND}which he lets out out to local farmers. As part of his{CONSERVATION}ideas he has set aside fourteen acres of his land for Scots pine trees. As well as this he recently purchased a section of the{DISUSED RAILWAY}which runs through his land. On this there are a considerable amount of Silver Birch trees which he has decided not to remove. Despite farmers' requests to remove hedgerows he has decided against it, to preserve the native fauna and flaura.
